prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra, chibi proportions with large translucent geometric solid head with unique Merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Vesica Piscis patterns, styled with Seraph commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Silver and neutral grey inspired by communication transcendent layered robes combining all elemental patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for unity and synthesis, elaborate with shifting Spirit element pentagram motifs and unifying patterns and Merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rainbow essence wisps and transcendent particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor LEXARPH's profile: 'He who is first of the air', Aethyr ZAX, Spirit element, Tarot The Hierophant, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'In LEXARPH's presence, a liminal breeze seems to whisper fate onto invisible vellum one can almost read the script of destiny between worlds.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent geometric solid head with unique Merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Vesica Piscis patterns, styled with Seraph commands influences

outfit.base: transcendent layered robes combining all elemental patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for unity and synthesis
outfit.details: Spirit element pentagram motifs and unifying patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rainbow essence wisps and transcendent particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is first of the air'
profile_data.essence: In LEXARPH's presence, a liminal breeze seems to whisper fate onto invisible vellum one can almost read the script of destiny between worlds.
profile_data.angelic_role: Seraph of Primacy of Air; commands stoneclad sentinels.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent geometric form that shifts between tetrahedron and octahedron, representing the liminal nature of air and spirit - neither fully solid nor completely ethereal
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver-white represents spiritual purity and air's luminosity, while turquoise symbolizes the transformative power of ZAX Aethyr and the communication between celestial and terrestrial realms
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent interdimensional travel, divine intelligence, and the fundamental patterns of creation
